title: How to generate a Fibonacci sequence in Python - Quora

response.answer_text: from functools import lru_cache @lru_cache() def fib(n):     if n == 1:         return 1     elif n==2:         return 1     elif n>2:         return fib(n-1)+fib(n-2) for n in range(1,1001):    print(n, ":", fib(n))  Using this you can print Fibonacci Sequence :)
